name: df-mid
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cmid, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), crio(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cv(s1)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ midG =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(Base ` s0), s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0)‚Ü¶ iota(s3 ‚àà(Base ` s0), s2 =(((pInvG ` s0)` s3)` s1))))
comment: Define the midpoint operation. Definition 10.1 of [Schwabhauser] p. 88. See ~ ismidb , ~ midbtwn , and ~ midcgr . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Jun-2019.)
